page.title: 09CHIPPENHAM COLLEGE
page.content: Chippenham Technical College offers full and part-time courses in the following subjects: Engineering,Business Studies,General Education,Communications and Media Studies,Adult and Community Services.These classes are attended by full-time,part-time evening,block release and day release students.The level varies from Ordinary Level through to Highter National Diplomas. In 1984-5 there were 11,000 student enrolments which is 1 in every 10 people in the catchment area.This includes school link students,full time students, adult leisure students in all the towns and villages as well as full time students including those sponsored by the Manpower Services Commission.
